summary: Completed testing of multiple categories feature implementation. Backend functionality fully tested and working correctly. Frontend implementation verified through code review but UI testing limited by authentication requirements.

minor_issues.issue: AI chat returns guide-based response instead of expected mocked response text
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works but response format differs from test expectation

authentication_issues.issue: App shows landing page requiring authentication, preventing full UI testing
authentication_issues.workaround: Backend API testing confirms functionality works correctly

passed_tests: POST /api/posts - Create post with multiple categories (up to 3)
GET /api/posts - Returns posts with categories array field
Category filtering - Posts filtered by any of their multiple categories
Volunteer category matching - Volunteers see posts matching their help categories
Multiple categories validation - Correctly handles 1-3 categories per post
Category filtering validation - Posts appear when filtering by any category
Backend API endpoints - All core endpoints working correctly
User registration and authentication - Working properly
Database operations - Posts stored and retrieved with multiple categories

success_percentage.frontend: Partial - Code implementation verified, UI testing blocked by authentication
